snippet: According to a recent Egyptian television report, a close reading of a 2001 “Simpsons” episode “suggests that what is happening in Syria today was premeditated.”
abstract: According to a recent Egyptian television report, a close reading of a 2001 “Simpsons” episode “suggests that what is happening in Syria today was premeditated.”

headline.main: Egyptian TV Cites 'Simpsons' Episode as Proof Arab Spring Was Foreign Plot
